Harry's Recipes

Risotto

Ingredients

  • chilli
  • garlic
  • spring onions
  • spinach
  • aborio rice
  • nutritional yeast
  • mushrooms
  • stock cubes
  • olive oil

Method

  1. Chop mushrooms, spring onion, chilli and garlic.
  2. Fry chopped ingredients in a large pan with some olive oil until mushrooms are translucent.
  3. Add rice to pan, with stock (2:1 ratio). Bring to a boil then turn down to simmer. Simmer until rice is cooked.
  4. Add nutritional yeast and spinach.
  5. Serve with salt and pepper to taste.
